kalayak thisse ( awurudu 3 k withara ) api nihandawa balan hitiya "eeniya sinhala blog awakashe " blog charitha haduna hati .meyalata bahutharaya yam wadagath deyak liyala newe charitha wune ,ekata bila bona arakku brands gana, bila sur wela than than wala nidagaththu hati , blog eke liyala , mada gahala , wala katha +18 plas katha ,kotu panina hati , yata andum katha liyala , yamak hondata liyana blog karayanta /kariyanta set wela pahara dila , ehema pahara denna thawa uwamana nam ee wenuwenma blog post ehemath liyala , kunu harupen banala bas chat karala , eewa munu poth walath dala , indahita hadawath unu wela samaja sathkara karala ee gana ee wadeta wada boru prasiddi dila ,hit kament laksha ganan walin siniyar kiyala namak hadan indahita juniyarlata atha dila handunwala dila karaliyata genith , ( blogar templets thiyeddi oone kenekuta eekata akses wenna puluwan kama thiyeddi me ayiyala katha karanne nikan blogar haduwe eyala wage ) , karata atha dan jiwath wuna udawiyane me wirasaka wela thiyenne .thamange blog wala thaman liyanana de gana pramithiyak nathi minissu in ehata gihilla thamange kal kriyawe pramithiyak pawathwagena yawida ?
